a0317c48-b404-4b77-8569-9612b7d01f52.title: Insulation
a0317c48-b404-4b77-8569-9612b7d01f52.description: Use this block for heat stability!

09c99d75-22ac-4dcf-8dba-85e30732066f.title: Solar Panel
09c99d75-22ac-4dcf-8dba-85e30732066f.description: Use this block to generate power!

b856bf02-08ba-4ff6-8b07-80bd37e08175.title: Inside Space Station Block
b856bf02-08ba-4ff6-8b07-80bd37e08175.description: Use this block to build the insides you your space stations or space ships!

acc14fa2-7f72-45af-8ffc-91197c453580.title: Space stations Hazard block
acc14fa2-7f72-45af-8ffc-91197c453580.description: Use this block to build the insides you your space stations or space ships!

200487e7-97eb-49af-980c-6342fd39eca6.title: Radiator Panel
200487e7-97eb-49af-980c-6342fd39eca6.description: Use this block to radiate heat away faster from your objects!

60d11652-5f27-4b1c-b49c-08767c52cc5b.description: It looks like Moon or Mars rock depending on the color you paint it!

1082e31d-4c9a-476c-965f-1fa3e15f01cf.title: Soyuz descent module (half)
1082e31d-4c9a-476c-965f-1fa3e15f01cf.description: Place module two of them back to each other on Soyuz propulsion module!

17c45d79-e806-49e3-a660-cd6e1fb33891.title: Soyuz orbital module
17c45d79-e806-49e3-a660-cd6e1fb33891.description: Place at the top of Soyuz descent module!

9ac6fde9-a433-4453-a72c-bf585672105f.description: Place this part first! Hide stabilizers and fly mechanics inside!

5ac3e614-6205-49fa-afa2-da176485f4b1.title: Force Field Block
5ac3e614-6205-49fa-afa2-da176485f4b1.description: 100% invisible! Has collision of 1 block. Can be found using connect tool (it's a button)

a9a208d2-e70a-496b-922c-630e1e84e194.title: Satellite Dish
a9a208d2-e70a-496b-922c-630e1e84e194.description: Use this block to send data!

b5931b43-34f0-4c54-ad5e-36f9537c8919.description:
!!!WARNING!!! Very heavy! 


Eight of these can make it underground! Used to move to center of mass

148fec95-471e-4ed0-9aad-ae853426b69a.description: Used to place things into orbit

8c08a5a2-f5b2-4c4a-86df-9b7a955d4622.description: Use this block to make space rovers or space cars! This is the same size as the Small Wheel in game!

a785baa0-eda5-4d32-a7b2-63621ab61c19.title: Space Wheel Giant
a785baa0-eda5-4d32-a7b2-63621ab61c19.description: Use this block to make space rovers or space cars! This is a GIANT wheel!

56640b05-c0bc-4b3a-93b0-4c5d74b46445.description: The brightest ever satellite! Unfortunately, it got damaged and it couldn't deploy the triangle :( Click to expand the pyramid! 1:1 SCALE!!!

7b8a28c0-ca47-406c-a2c2-92a2e7505413.description: Use this block to build structure of your buildings!

3ddea6a1-97ad-44e5-827c-fa47ee044723.description: Use this block to decorate your spaceship or space stations!

148fec95-471e-4ed0-9aad-ae853426b58a.title: Scrap Rocket fairing
148fec95-471e-4ed0-9aad-ae853426b58a.description: You don't wanna burn during getting to orbit, do you?

943d5fdc-e882-4df8-a209-258b1dec5aac.title: #ff0000 Information Block
943d5fdc-e882-4df8-a209-258b1dec5aac.description:
#FF9000All information about last updates will appear here! 

#0000ffCurrent Workshop version: V1.0
Current Game Files version: V1.0


#ff9000Visit mod on workshop page to download Game files part!

 If you don't know how to use something, check mod description on the workshop!

 Search #0000ffSoyuz Spacecraft #ff9000and #0000ffScrap Rocket #ff9000on the workshop for already working examples!

2cbf9e07-fed9-415b-9362-1dba41227b85.title: ScrapX Landing Leg
2cbf9e07-fed9-415b-9362-1dba41227b85.description: Used to recover parts of rockets

[THRUSTER, IT ACCUALLY CAN STEER]
